statements: SELECT * FROM notifications ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT message, timestamp FROM notifications WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT notification_id, message FROM notifications WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT notification_id, user_id, timestamp FROM notifications WHERE message LIKE '%important%';
SELECT * FROM notifications WHERE user_id = '789e6543-21bd-23d1-c654-416149965432' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM notifications WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT notification_id, message FROM notifications WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM notifications ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(notification_id) AS total_notifications FROM notifications GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY total_notifications DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_notifications FROM notifications GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM notifications;
SELECT user_id, message FROM notifications ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT message FROM notifications WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, message, created_at FROM notifications WHERE created_at >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM user_settings WHERE enable_notifications = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM notifications WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT notification_id, message FROM notifications WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, notification_threshold FROM user_settings WHERE enable_notifications = true;
SELECT message AS notification_message, created_at AS timestamp FROM notifications ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT user_id, notification_frequency FROM user_settings WHERE notification_threshold > 5 AND enable_notifications = true;
SELECT * FROM notifications WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT message, created_at FROM notifications WHERE notification_id = 3;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT user_id, usage_timestamp FROM lighting_usage ORDER BY usage_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM lighting_usage WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY usage_duration DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE lighting_preference = 'Warm' ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE lighting_preference = 'Bright' AND username LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY email DESC;
SELECT notification_id, user_id, message, created_at FROM notifications WHERE user_id = 3 ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT u.username, l.usage_timestamp, l.usage_duration FROM users u INNER JOIN lighting_usage l ON u.user_id = l.user_id WHERE l.usage_duration > 60 ORDER BY u.username ASC, l.usage_timestamp DESC;

SELECT n.message, u.username, l.usage_duration FROM notifications n LEFT JOIN users u ON n.user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN lighting_usage l ON n.user_id = l.user_id WHERE l.usage_duration < 30 OR u.username IS NULL ORDER BY n.message ASC, u.username DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE timezone='UTC';
SELECT device_name, brightness, power_on FROM lighting_devices ORDER BY device_name ASC;
SELECT pattern_id, start_time, end_time, pattern_description FROM usage_patterns WHERE start_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, notification_type, enable_notifications FROM notification_settings WHERE user_id=1001;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT device_name, brightness FROM lighting_devices WHERE room_id = 2 ORDER BY brightness DESC;
SELECT pattern_description FROM usage_patterns WHERE device_id = 5 AND start_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT setting_id, notification_type FROM notification_settings WHERE enable_notifications = true ORDER BY setting_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, notification_settings FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM notifications WHERE user_id = 3 ORDER BY created_at ASC;
SELECT user_id, brightness, color FROM lighting_settings WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM lighting_usage WHERE user_id = 5 AND usage_duration > 60 ORDER BY usage_timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(usage_id) AS total_usage FROM lighting_usage GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_usage > 5;
SELECT u.username, ls.brightness FROM users u JOIN lighting_settings ls ON u.user_id = ls.user_id WHERE ls.brightness > 50 ORDER BY u.username ASC, ls.brightness DESC;
